ã€ @param info ä¸‹æ³¨ä¿¡æ¯ @param passTypes è¿‡å…³æ–¹å¼ @return Mä¸²1æˆ–è€…Mä¸²Næœ‰å‡ ç§ç»„åˆï¼ˆå‡ æ³¨ï¼‰ / @Override public int getPourHandle(String info, List<String> passTypes) { List<String> result = new ArrayList<>(); for (String passType : passTypes) { String[] mWithn = passType.split(â€œâ€œ); Integer m = Integer.parseInt(mWithn[0]); Integer n = Integer.parseInt(mWithn[1]); ArrayList<String> temp = matchTransform(info, m, null, 0); if (temp == null) { return 0; } String[] bet = temp.toArray(new String[temp.size()]); ArrayList<String> tmpArr = new ArrayList<>(); Map<String, String> checkGroups = new Hashtable<>(); ArrayList<String> groups = new ArrayList<>(); combine(0, m, bet, false, checkGroups, tmpArr, groups); ArrayList<String> processGroups = new Integer.valueOf(String.valueOf(a[i].charAt(0))), CalculateN, true, checkGroups, new ArrayList<String>(), groups); } i++; } } processGroups.clear(); processGroups.addAll(groups); } result.addAll(processGroups); } return result.size(); } / é€’å½’è®¡ç®—æ’åˆ—ç»„åˆ @param index å•ç»„åˆä¸­å·²ç»ç´¯ç§¯çš„å…ƒç´ @param k ä¸€ä¸ªç»„åˆéœ€è¦å‡ ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ç»„æˆ @param arr æº @param checkGroups ä¸å«é‡å¤çš„æ’åˆ—ç»„åˆåˆ—è¡¨(å…ˆå»æ‰æ­¤æ ¡éªŒï¼Œå¦‚è¿è¡Œä¸€æ®µæ—¶é—´æ— å¦¨ åˆ™å½»åº•å»é™¤å®ƒ) @param tmpArr æœ¬æ¬¡ç»„æˆçš„æ’åˆ—ç»„åˆ @param groups ä¸€ç§è¿‡å…³æ–¹å¼çš„ç»“æœ / public static void combine(int index, int k, String[] arr, boolean repeat, Map<String, String> checkGroups, ArrayList<String> tmpArr, ArrayList<String> groups) { if (k == 1) { for (int i = index; i < arr.length; i++) { tmpArr.add(arr[i]); String isAdd = â€œaddâ€; if (repeat) { // isAdd = toRepeat(arr, checkGroups, tmpArr, isAdd); } else { Map<String, String> map = new Hashtable<>(); String tmpStr = tmpArr.toString(); String[] tmpArray = tmpStr.substring(0, tmpStr.length() - 1).split(â€œ,â€); for (String temp : tmpArray) { //æˆªå–å‡ºç»„åˆä¸­æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªçš„æ¯”èµ›ç¼–å·å”¯ä¸€æ ‡è¯†å­˜å…¥é›†åˆ String matchCode = String.valueOf(temp.charAt(temp.length() - 1)); //å¦‚å·²åŒ…å« åˆ™è¡¨ç¤ºæ’åˆ—ç»„åˆæ‹¥æœ‰ç›¸åŒæ¯”èµ› ä¸å…æ·»åŠ if (map.get(matchCode) != null) { isAdd = â€œâ€; break; } //Valueæ— ç”¨ï¼Œåªç”¨Keyå’ŒHASHç‰¹æ€§ map.put(matchCode, matchCode); } } if (isAdd.equals(â€œaddâ€)) {// checkGroups.put(tmpArr.toString().replaceAll(â€œ\â€œ,â€â€),tmpArr.toString().trim()); groups.add(tmpArr.toString()); } for (Iterator it = tmpArr.iterator(); it.hasNext(); ) { if (it.next().equals(arr[i])) it.remove(); } } } else if (k > 1) { for (int i = index; i <= arr.length - k; i++) { tmpArr.add(arr[i]); combine(i + 1, k - 1, arr, repeat, checkGroups, tmpArr, groups); for (Iterator it = tmpArr.iterator(); it.hasNext(); ) { if (it.next().equals(arr[i])) it.remove(); } } } else { return; } }/ å»é™¤é‡å¤ç»„åˆ(åŒç§ç©æ³•ä¸å…è®¸é‡å¤) @param arr é€‰æ‹©çš„å†…å®¹ @param checkGroups ä¸å«é‡å¤çš„æ’åˆ—ç»„åˆåˆ—è¡¨(å…ˆå»æ‰æ­¤æ ¡éªŒï¼Œå¦‚è¿è¡Œä¸€æ®µæ—¶é—´æ— å¦¨ åˆ™å½»åº•å»é™¤å®ƒ) @param tmpArr æœ¬æ¬¡ç»„æˆçš„æ’åˆ—ç»„åˆ @param isAdd æ˜¯å¦èƒ½å¤Ÿæ·»åŠ @return / public static String toRepeat(String[] arr, Map<String, String> checkGroups, ArrayList<String> tmpArr, String isAdd) { (!tmpArr.toString().contains(arr[j])) {// if (checkGroups.get(b.trim())!=null){ isAdd = â€œâ€; return isAdd;// } } } } return isAdd; } / @param schemeNumber ä¸‹æ³¨ä¿¡æ¯ @param m è¦æ±‚ç»„çš„æ¯”èµ›æ•° @param matchNumber å®ä½“ç±»æ˜ å°„å‚ç…§ï¼ˆ0ï¼šåªè®¡ç®—æ³¨æ•°ï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦æ˜ å°„ã€‚1ï¼šä¼ ç¥¨ç»„åˆï¼Œéœ€è¦æ˜ å°„ï¼‰ @param schemeNumber æœªå¤„ç†çš„ä¸‹æ³¨ä¿¡æ¯ @param Type ï¼ˆè®¡ç®—æ³¨æ•°ï¼š0ï¼Œä¼ ç¥¨ç»„åˆï¼š1ï¼‰ @return å¤„ç†åçš„ä¸‹æ³¨ä¿¡æ¯ / public static ArrayList<String> matchTransform(String schemeNumber, Integer m, Map<String, String> matchNumber, Integer Type) { ArrayList<String> matchTransform = new ArrayList(); String[] matchs = schemeNumber.split(â€œ\|â€); if (matchs.length < m) { //ä¸æ»¡è¶³ç»„Måœºæ¯”èµ›çš„è¦æ±‚ return null; } for (int j = 0; j < matchs.length; j++) { String match = matchs[j]; String matchArray[] = match.split(â€œ-â€œ); String matchHead = matchArray[0]; String temp = matchArray[1]; String[] matchPlayType = temp.split(â€œ,â€); for (int i = 0; i < matchPlayType.length; i++) { StringBuffer playMethod = new StringBuffer(); StringBuffer matchNumberValue = new StringBuffer(); String symbol = â€œ-â€œ; String[] temp2 = matchPlayType[i].split(â€œ~â€); String[] temp3 = temp2[1].split(â€œ\^â€); String odds = temp3[1]; String playTypePart = temp3[0]; String playType = temp2[0] + playTypePart; int sum = appearNumber(matchTransform.toString(), playTypePart + letter[j]); if (sum == 0) { playMethod.append(â€œâ€œ); } playMethod.append(playType); playMethod.append(letter[j]); matchTransform.add(playMethod.toString()); if (Type == 1) { //key = æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«é‡å¤é€‰æ‹©,ç©æ³•ï¼Œæ¯”èµ›ç¼–å·å”¯ä¸€æ ‡è¯†,value = å¯¹é˜µä¿¡æ¯+ç©æ³•ä¸èµ”ç‡ matchNumberValue.append(matchHead).append(symbol).append(temp2[0]).append(symbol).append(odds); matchNumber.put(playMethod.toString(), matchNumberValue.toString()); } } } return matchTransform; } /* è·å–æŒ‡å®šå­—ç¬¦ä¸²å‡ºç°çš„æ¬¡æ•° @param srcText æºå­—ç¬¦ä¸² @param findText è¦æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸² @return */ public static int appearNumber(String srcText, String findText) { int count = 0; Pattern p = Pattern.compile(findText); Matcher m = p.matcher(srcText); while (m.find()) { count++; } return count; } GuideFourthW 1 Artikel 1 Kategorien 1 schlagwÃ¶rter RSS GitHub Twitter E-Mail æœ¬ç«™æ€»è®¿é—®é‡æ¬¡ åšå®¢å…¨ç«™å…±:0 å­—© 2019 æ¬¢è¿æ‚¨çš„åˆ°æ¥ğŸ˜˜ if $localSearchInput.attr(â€œautocapitalizeâ€, â€œnoneâ€); $localSearchInput.attr(â€œautocorrectâ€, â€œoffâ€); $localSearchInput.focus(); } // search function; var searchFunc = function(path, search_id, $(â€œ#search-loading-iconâ€).css(â€˜marginâ€™, â€˜20% auto 0 autoâ€™).css(â€˜text-alignâ€™, â€˜centerâ€™); $.ajax({ url: path, dataType: isXml ? â€œxmlâ€ : â€œjsonâ€, async: true, success: $(â€œtitleâ€, this).text(), content: $(â€œcontentâ€,this).text(), url: $(â€œurlâ€ , this).text() }; }).get() : res; var input = document.getElementById(search_id); var resultContent = document.getElementById(content_id); var inputEventFunction = function() { var searchText = input.value.trim().toLowerCase(); var keywords = searchText.split(/[\s-]+/); if (keywords.length > 1) {
